data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring chronology of Pinus cembra (Arolla pine) compiled from tree samples STU-AR

Exposition SE, Slope 25 deg, Geology: Gneis-Schutthalde, Tree line 2100 m, av. Tree height 25 m, Tree cover 60%, Herb cover 75%, Moss cover 50%, Vegatation type: sauer,normarl drainiert, Film number: 251
